posts.post_content:
Looks like he's missing a puzzle piece :P  
  
If you're a fan of this guy's insta-stab ETB mechanic, Scars of Mirrodin's [Pierce Strider](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pierce Strider) and [Inquisitor Exarch](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Inquisitor Exarch) have it as well, pinging for 3 life and 2 life respectively on ETB. They don't have undying, but I find [Postmortem Lunge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Postmortem Lunge) to be a rather decent substitute.
posts.html:
Looks like he's missing a puzzle piece :P

If you're a fan of this guy's insta-stab ETB mechanic, Scars of Mirrodin's Pierce Strider and Inquisitor Exarch have it as well, pinging for 3 life and 2 life respectively on ETB. They don't have undying, but I find Postmortem Lunge to be a rather decent substitute.

Posted By: blindloyalty (4/20/2012 10:56:39 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Probably one of the best aggro cards in any color ever. If it dies, it's 4 burn damage and a 4/3 body for 3. If it doesn't, it's 2 burn damage and a 3/2 (going unblocked or killing a bunch of chumps) for 3. Even if [Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile)d or [Pacifism](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pacifism)ed, does 2 damage for 3 mana, which is fine considering what happens to any other card that gets targeted by those types of cards. I didn't think [Shambling Remains](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shambling Remains) would ever get better, especially not in monocolor, though Remains is still better when facing counterspells.
posts.html:
Probably one of the best aggro cards in any color ever. If it dies, it's 4 burn damage and a 4/3 body for 3. If it doesn't, it's 2 burn damage and a 3/2 (going unblocked or killing a bunch of chumps) for 3. Even if Path to Exiled or Pacifismed, does 2 damage for 3 mana, which is fine considering what happens to any other card that gets targeted by those types of cards. I didn't think Shambling Remains would ever get better, especially not in monocolor, though Remains is still better when facing counterspells.
